options: ['in holes', 'under the ground', 'on the farm', 'in nests and trees']
article:
Everybody has a home. We people have homes,animals have homes,too.
Some animals live under the ground. The woodchuck  lives in holes  under the ground. His home has two doors. If anybody comes in one door, he goes out from the other door. Some birds live in nests  and trees. They come out for food in the day and go back to sleep at night. But many birds just live in the trees. Bees  work hard to make their homes. There are many,many little rooms in their house... Cows  ,sheep  and chicks  live in people's homes. And that is called farm.
We see all kinds of animals in the zoo. It's a big home for lots of animals.
